changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.id: Migrate the user's institute id from respective department
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_user usr using ( select u.identifier as user_id, inst.identifier as inst_id from catissue_user u inner join os_departments dept on dept.identifier = u.department_id inner join catissue_institution inst on inst.identifier = dept.institute_id ) t on (usr.identifier = t.user_id) when matched then update set usr.institute_id = t.inst_id

changeSet.id: Updated user view
changeSet.sql: create or replace view USER_VIEW as ( select u.identifier as identifier, u.first_name as first_name, u.last_name as last_name, u.email_address as email_address, concat(u.first_name, concat(' ', u.last_name)) as name, i.name as institute_name from catissue_user u inner join catissue_institution i on u.institute_id = i.identifier )
